content.raw:
Just want to say that we see this too, and saw it in what was a rather humorous way during the dry run today.

Essentially, if you fall down, the robot is unusable from that point forward; you have to restart the sim to regain use of the legs.  You can reharness two, three, a zillion times, and the first step you attempt to take results in disaster.  It's not clear exactly why; I have some sense that the robot may have lost it's sense of foot position (i.e. we command a baby step, and Val tries to take a huge step).
